column3:
It's like carrying a gas burner—punching
would be faster.

Can be upgraded to +10, letting you hurl
a gigantic fireball at your foe.

Being hit by a rock hurts far more than
a chunk of ice—this spell is nearly
useless.

Can be upgraded to +10, letting you
throw a massive block of ice at the
enemy.

A technique for opposing ghosts. This is
the only thing that can harm them.
